languages.text: "Мы не разоримся, Ваша Светлость. Примите небольшой дар от меня... и моих деловых партнеров". {n}Октавиана передает вам старую и явно {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}очень дорогую бутыль амасека{/d} темно-красного цвета.{/n} "Лучшее лекарство от ужасов, таящихся во тьме неизведанного".

"We won't go bankrupt, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Please accept this small gift from me... and my business partners." {n}Octaviana hands you an old, and, no doubt, {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}very expensive, bottle of dark-red amasec{/d}.{/n} "The best medicine against the terrors that lurk in the dark unknown."
languages.original_text: "Мы не разоримся, Ваша Светлость. Примите небольшой дар от меня... и моих деловых партнеров". {n}Октавиана передает вам старую и явно {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}очень дорогую бутыль амасека{/d} темно-красного цвета.{/n} "Лучшее лекарство от ужасов, таящихся во тьме неизведанного".

traits.locale_text: "We won't go bankrupt, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Please accept this small gift from me... and my business partners." {n}Octaviana hands you an old, and clearly very expensive, bottle of dark-red amasec.{/n} "The best medicine against the terrors that lurk in the dark unknown."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "We won't go bankrupt, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Please accept this small gift from me... and my business partners." {n}Octaviana hands you an old, and, no doubt, {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}very expensive, bottle of dark-red amasec{/d}.{/n} "The best medicine against the terrors that lurk in the dark unknown."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: “没事，你不在，我们也不会破产的，大人。请收下这件小小的礼物吧，是我……和我的生意伙伴送给你的。”{n}奥克塔维娜递给你一瓶深红色的艾玛赛克陈酿。{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}毫无疑问，这瓶酒价值连城{/d}。{/n}“当你遇到黑暗中的未知恐怖时，这玩意儿就是对付它的最佳良药。”
languages.original_text: "We won't go bankrupt, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Please accept this small gift from me... and my business partners." {n}Octaviana hands you an old, and, no doubt, {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}very expensive, bottle of dark-red amasec{/d}.{/n} "The best medicine against the terrors that lurk in the dark unknown."

traits.locale_text: “没事，您不在，我们也不会破产的，大人。请收下这件小小的礼物吧，是我……和我的生意伙伴送给您的。”{n}奥克塔维娜递给你一瓶深红色的艾玛赛克陈酿。毫无疑问，这瓶酒价值连城。{/n}“遇到黑暗中的未知恐怖时，这玩意儿就是对付它的最佳良药。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「私達は倒産なんてしませんわ、陛下。どうかこの些細な贈り物を受け取ってください…私と商売仲間達からの物です」{n}オクタヴィアナが、古く、{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}明らかに高価そうな、濃い赤色のアマセックボトルを渡してくる{/d}。{/n}「未知の闇に潜む恐怖に対しての、一番の薬です」
languages.original_text: "We won't go bankrupt, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Please accept this small gift from me... and my business partners." {n}Octaviana hands you an old, and, no doubt, {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}very expensive, bottle of dark-red amasec{/d}.{/n} "The best medicine against the terrors that lurk in the dark unknown."

traits.locale_text: 「私達は倒産なんてしませんわ、陛下。どうかこの些細な贈り物を受け取ってください…私と商売仲間達からの物です」{n}オクタヴィアナが、古く、{d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}明らかに高価そうな、濃い赤色のアマセックボトルを渡してくる{/d}。{/n}「未知の闇に潜む恐怖に対しての、一番の薬です」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «No nos iremos a la quiebra, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Por favor, acepte este pequeño regalo de mi parte... y de mis socios». {n}Octaviana te entrega una {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}botella de amasec de color rojo oscuro vieja y cara{/d}.{/n} «La mejor medicina para los terrores que acechan en la oscuridad desconocida».
languages.original_text: "We won't go bankrupt, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Please accept this small gift from me... and my business partners." {n}Octaviana hands you an old, and, no doubt, {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}very expensive, bottle of dark-red amasec{/d}.{/n} "The best medicine against the terrors that lurk in the dark unknown."

traits.locale_text: «No nos iremos a la quiebra, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Por favor, acepte este pequeño regalo de mi parte... y de mis socios». {n}Octaviana te entrega una botella de amasec de color rojo oscuro vieja pero cara.{/n} «La mejor medicina para los terrores que acechan en la oscuridad desconocida».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Wir werden nicht bankrott gehen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Bitte akzeptiert dieses kleine Geschenk von mir ... und meinen Geschäftspartnern." {n}Octaviana überreicht dir eine alte und gewiss {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}extrem teure Flasche dunkelroten Amasec{/d}.{/n} "Die beste Medizin gegen die Schrecken, die in der unbekannten Dunkelheit lauern."
languages.original_text: "We won't go bankrupt, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Please accept this small gift from me... and my business partners." {n}Octaviana hands you an old, and, no doubt, {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}very expensive, bottle of dark-red amasec{/d}.{/n} "The best medicine against the terrors that lurk in the dark unknown."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden nicht bankrott gehen, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft. Bitte akzeptiert dieses kleine Geschenk von mir ... und meinen Geschäftspartnern." {n}Octaviana überreicht dir eine alte und gewiss extrem teure Flasche dunkelroten Amasec.{/n} "Die beste Medizin gegen die Schrecken, die in der unbekannten Dunkelheit lauern."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Oh, on ne fera pas faillite, Votre Seigneurie. Veuillez accepter ce petit cadeau de ma part... et de celle de mes associés. » {n}Octaviana vous tend une {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}bouteille visiblement ancienne – et probablement très coûteuse – d'un amasec rouge sombre{/d}.{/n} « Le meilleur remède contre les horreurs qui rôdent dans les ténèbres de l'inconnu. »
languages.original_text: "We won't go bankrupt, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Please accept this small gift from me... and my business partners." {n}Octaviana hands you an old, and, no doubt, {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}very expensive, bottle of dark-red amasec{/d}.{/n} "The best medicine against the terrors that lurk in the dark unknown."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, on ne fera pas faillite, Votre Seigneurie. Veuillez accepter ce petit cadeau de ma part... et de celle de mes associés. » {n}Octaviana vous tend une bouteille visiblement ancienne – et probablement très coûteuse – d'un amasec rouge sombre.{/n} « Le meilleur remède contre les horreurs qui rôdent dans les ténèbres de l'inconnu. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "İflas etmeyiz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Lütfen benden ve... İş ortaklarımdan gelen bu küçük armağanı kabul buyurun." {n}Octaviana sana eski ve şüphesiz {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}çok pahalı bir şişe koyu kırmızı amasek{/d} veriyor.{/n} "Bilinmeyen karanlıklarda kol gezen dehşetlere karşı en iyi ilaç."
languages.original_text: "We won't go bankrupt, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Please accept this small gift from me... and my business partners." {n}Octaviana hands you an old, and, no doubt, {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}very expensive, bottle of dark-red amasec{/d}.{/n} "The best medicine against the terrors that lurk in the dark unknown."

traits.locale_text: "İflas etmeyiz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Lütfen benden ve... İş ortaklarımdan gelen bu küçük armağanı kabul edin." {n}Octaviana sana eski ve hiç şüphe yok ki {d|Encyclopedia:KasballicaRep_Mid}çok pahalı bir şişe koyu kırmızı amasek{/d} veriyor.{/n} "Bilinmeyen karanlıklarda kol gezen dehşetlere karşı en iyi ilaç."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04
